=== Ubuntu Logo ===

The Ubuntu Visual Identity guidelines and assets are available on the  <nowiki>[[https://design.ubuntu.com/brand/ubuntu-logo|Ubuntu Brand Guidelines website]]</nowiki> and its <nowiki>[[https://design.ubuntu.com/downloads?metadata=element-logo+brand-ubuntu|Downloads section]]</nowiki>.  Please refer to the <nowiki>[[https://www.ubuntu.com/legal/terms-and-policies/intellectual-property-policy#your-use-of-our-trademarks|trademark policy]]</nowiki> for information regarding permission and correct usage of the logo.
